desc: Stagnant hair growth can be frustrating, and can sometimes cause insecurity in women, and men. Our Anti-Itch Hair Growth Oil penetrates the scalp to stimulate the growth of healthy hair follicles. Our water based Edge Control doesn't flake, and is extremely long lasting, and paraben free!
